entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
